idea-plugin.name: Tui
idea-plugin.description:
Plugin provides text ui for directory listings. Inspired by emacs dired mode.
To open a directory as text, run the TOpenDir action.
Keys in directory file:
  • enter - open file
  • j - move caret down
  • k - move caret up
  • g - refresh
  • p - copy path to clipboard
  • u - go to parent directory
  • q - close the dir and open previous file (if there was a previous file in the editor when dir was opened)
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• Ability to open arbitrary directory
  • Ability to open file under caret in project view and in terminal
